EmailTemplate.name: 201807_WebinarInvite_TCASAirbus_LG.201807_WebinarInvite_TCASAirbus_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Technical Webinar: Optimize TCAS Troubleshooting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Tech Tips Webinar: Optimize TCAS Troubleshooting Please join us... Date July 24, 2018
Two Options: 12pm-1pm EST <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_wNUOVPpuS9GC19oFyddK3Q> (UTC -5) <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_wNUOVPpuS9GC19oFyddK3Q>
9pm-10pm EST <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_GOrxM9T8T0WNx35QFVwuLQ> (UTC -5) <https://honeywell-it.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_GOrxM9T8T0WNx35QFVwuLQ>
Location Please click the appropriate link above to register.
Honeywell pioneered traffic alert collision avoidance system (TCAS) technology for military and commercial aircraft more than a half-century ago and has delivered more systems than anyone else.
Please join Mark Liles, a Honeywell product support expert, to explore maintenance best practices and published technical service information to optimize TCAS troubleshooting and reduce no-fault-founds. Register by selecting one of the two optional sessions.
Questions will be answered.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]>
